sentences.en: Based on thermo - physics the dryness - fraction regulation and realization model is established.
sentences.cn: 基于热力学建立干度调节与量值确定理论模型.

sentences.en: Dryness at the roots can occur very easily specially when plants are grown in containers.
sentences.cn: 根部很容易干枯，特别是当植株被种养在盆中时。

sentences.en: Dryness to avoid creating bronzing layer oxidizing or injury.
sentences.cn: 燥,以免造成烫金层氧化或损伤.

sentences.en: Elinor had ceased to rejoice in the dryness of the season.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺不再为这些日子气候干燥而高兴.

sentences.en: Exhaust before water pressure test, drainage before manufacture, dryness and medium isolation.
sentences.cn: 水压试验前排气 、 生产前排水 、 干燥、介质隔离.

sentences.en: For some women, this leads to a decrease in sexual desire or arousal, vaginal dryness, or difficulty achieving orgasm.
sentences.cn: 对一些女人来说，这会导致性欲或性兴奋下降、阴道干燥或难以到达高潮。

sentences.en: Her manner assumed a dispassion and dryness very unlike her usual tone.
sentences.cn: 她装出一种冷静和超然的样子,非常不像她平常的神气.

sentences.en: Her writing has a wry dryness.
sentences.cn: 她的作品有一种冷嘲式的幽默。

sentences.en: However much water cannot quench my dryness love to you.
sentences.cn: 即使再多的水也无法熄灭我对你爱的渴求.

sentences.en: It lighten seffectively the symptoms dryness and thirstiness heat , dizziness and pruritus.
sentences.cn: 此外,本品有平缓、续的降低血糖和血脂的作用, 可作为矿脲类.

sentences.en: Look for a moisturizer that's high petrolatum ( an anti - dryness agent ).
sentences.cn: 选用含矿脂 ( 一种 抗 干燥剂 ) 量高的润肤霜.

sentences.en: Newly formed skin cells retain more moisture and prevent future dryness.
sentences.cn: 新生成的皮肤细胞保留更多的水分预防以后的干燥.

sentences.en: Others complain of sensitivity to light or increased dryness as painful aftereffects.
sentences.cn: 还有些人主诉有对光线敏感,眼睛日益发干等痛苦的后遗症.

sentences.en: Some diseases as Parkinson's and Sjogren's asas certain medications also cause dryness.
sentences.cn: 某些疾病比如帕金森氏病和干燥综合症以及一些特定的药物也会引发干眼症.

sentences.en: Special material ensures stability of lens and prevents dryness.
sentences.cn: 特别材料确保了镜片的稳定性,防止干燥.

sentences.en: Symptoms included frequent dryness in the mouth.
sentences.cn: 症状包括经常口干舌燥。

sentences.en: This oil is also excellent for the cold weather, preventing dryness by providing moisture and essential nutrients.
sentences.cn: 这种油在寒冷的季节用也很好，它能提供水分和必需的营养素预防干燥。

sentences.en: When used in our food, heart-healthy olive oil provides an adequate source of fat to prevent dryness.
sentences.cn: 橄榄油用于食物中，能提供充足的脂质以防止食物干燥，而不会加重心脏负担。
